name: Roar: The Most Dangerous Movie Ever Made
description: Actress Tippi Hedren and her family set out to make a unique film by spending ten years living with and filming 150 untrained lions, tigers and assorted wild animals. Despite good intentions, more than 70 cast and crew were injured making the film.

episodes.name: Roar: Behind the Film
episodes.description: Actress Tippi Hedren and her family set out to make a unique film by spending ten years living with and filming 150 untrained lions, tigers and assorted wild animals. Despite good intentions, more than 70 cast and crew were injured making the film.
